sentences.en: A thin veneer of politeness hid Lady Bride’s growing anger.
sentences.cn: 布赖德夫人看上去不失礼数，内心的怒火却是愈燃愈烈。

sentences.en: Beneath the polished veneer, he is a country bumpkin.
sentences.cn: 尽管有着优雅的外表, 他不过是个乡巴佬.

sentences.en: He managed to acquire a thin veneer of knowledge to mask his real ignorance.
sentences.cn: 他设法装出有点知识的外表,用来掩饰自己的无知.

sentences.en: He was able to fool the world with his veneer of education.
sentences.cn: 他打着受过良好教育的幌子到处欺瞒世人。

sentences.en: Her veneer of politeness began to crack.
sentences.cn: 她那彬彬有礼的伪装开始露馅儿了。

sentences.en: His super-clean image gave a veneer of respectability to the new professional set-up.
sentences.cn: 他超级整洁的形象使其新设的专业骗局看起来很正规很体面。

sentences.en: His veneer of politeness concealed a ruthless determination.
sentences.cn: 他彬彬有礼的伪装下隐藏着不择手段的狠心.

sentences.en: I considered him to be far more veneer than substance.
sentences.cn: 我认为他过于虚伪,华而不实.

sentences.en: The furniture is made of plywood covered in teak veneer.
sentences.cn: 这家具是用贴柚木薄片的合板做成的.

sentences.en: The panel had a veneer of gold and ivory.
sentences.cn: 这木板上面镶饰了一层金和象牙.

sentences.en: The pine table top is overlaid with a mahogany veneer.
sentences.cn: 松木桌面镶有一层桃花心木的装饰薄板.

sentences.en: The saw quickly cut in through the veneer.
sentences.cn: 锯子很快地锯进胶合板.

sentences.en: The wood was cut into large sheets of veneer.
sentences.cn: 木料被锯成大块的薄板。

sentences.en: They have stripped the veneer of jingoism from the play, by showing war in its true horror.
sentences.cn: 他们剥除了极端爱国主义的外衣, 在剧中展示了战争恐怖的实质.

sentences.en: They're brutal people behind their civilised veneer.
sentences.cn: 他们表面上温文有礼,骨子里却是野蛮残忍.

sentences.en: Without the veneer, he would be exposed immediately.
sentences.cn: 如果不披着一层外皮, 他马上就会暴露.

words.tran_cn: 镶面；木板胶合；薄皮镶合
外表；虚饰；[建]饰面；胶合板的一层；[木]薄木片

trans.tran_cn: 饰面，护面，外饰，虚饰，表层饰板，薄木片
trans.tran_en: a thin layer of wood or plastic that covers the surface of a piece of furniture made of cheaper material, to make it look better

trans.tran_cn: 给…镶以饰片，虚饰，粉饰，镶盖，胶合
